content: {"name": "Berry Long United Methodist Church", "alternate_name": "", "description": null, "email": "", "url": "https://www.facebook.com/BerryLongChurch/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "1745 South 58th St", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19143", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.93693179983299, "longitude": -75.22973009957416}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 729-2500", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Program runs: 7/5/22 to 8/26/22"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}]}
